paragraph: Now, in the city, Maya, a internal-affairs detective, must prove a fatal police shooting was staged before a deadline. When a citywide manhunt led by her mentor and a corrupt task force forces Maya to commit, there is no turning back. After a brutal setback, Maya realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise. Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame. In a final confrontation, Maya faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
moral_premise: People succeed when they act with courage, and they fail when they protect themselves at the cost of justice.

When a citywide manhunt led by her mentor and a corrupt task force forces Maya to commit, there is no turning back.
After a brutal setback, Maya realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise.
Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame.
In a final confrontation, Maya faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
